summary: In San Francisco, a high-priced call girl is murdered and the case is assigned to Police Lieutenant Virgil Tibbs.
cast: Sidney Poitier|Martin Landau|Barbara McNair|Anthony Zerbe|Edward Asner|Jeff Corey|Norma Crane|Juano Hernandez|David Sheiner|Beverly Todd|Ted Gehring|Linda Towne|Garry Walberg|George Spell|Wanda Spell|John Alvin|Michael L. Davis|Dick Dial|Mickey Golden|Don Hanmer|Hilly Hicks|John Hillerman|Henry Leff|Erick Vinther|Al White
title: Ahora me llaman Sr. Tibbs
